subject: Vulnerability with the Widget Logic plugin

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5

action.text: Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security
vulnerability
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWukL6eYjGRlUZGKIx7PMBk84UndYJ6etLv9f2k1EU7IqINwNALm0nWr7k1PfgTJybpodtMqhIEd6hXDDhQCle4lE-3DLbxr_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKBk5ZgiEfJ9H-2Fn3CED0ZxGZrQkLkSycbixpBiQKQymUjFLHkhIIf7zuyxdlikbPq5pkabqP-2BcCLqbK09VFGLvOfHbQKbpUSzvR8Wm7QBNChLlVenDknJZOlhoP8-2FCnZlV4nFM1n3Go4HndVIBVsAz0lty1SBy6xwd2gyP5fxIiedMDtyTkKyTOn4Hpc3YWqkA-2Bum22W55NNlAEL5MS0niHY>
discovered in the *Widget Logic* plugin. We detected the plugin on one or
more of your websites:

• ladieslair

*You can ignore this message if you have already deactivated Widget Logic.*

The plugin has a vulnerability that makes it possible for authenticated
users with contributor (and higher) permissions to perform remote code
execution
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWusCgiFMU6Fk5Q83U6Bsa0iCAtYxZqekYxAciEFQZTX7U6N2xfhoLxxQzMlkl7f77hA-3D-3D5f-P_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKBk5ZgiEfJ9H-2Fn3CED0ZxGZbTEs3qJ-2B76dOc6OmjWwp11DrsKIA30QcwyDiplc7KYd64DGCp3yW-2BtvWcFshxr7x-2Fe-2BObOk2TVUSpobyYkF52A-2FKK-2F862bla4sdpOTtC6tdodMj35fdFHaIZ9qxuEtlG0gqw0bOfDhuKfF-2BMCwGi-2F0GUWuOz-2BcbkA5NN7lx1jtGOCO-2B6IErcUxgQ2FPw-2FIDQ>.


There is *no fix* available for the vulnerability, and the plugin is
temporarily closed for a security review.

No fix is currently available, so we recommend deactivating the plugin
immediately. You can reactivate and update the plugin if the author issues
a fixed version in the future.

To deactivate the plugin, log in to the Admin section of your site, go to
Plugins > Installed Plugins > Widget Logic, and click the “Deactivate” link
under the plugin name.

This vulnerability may exist in both live and staging environments. We
recommend that both be checked and that the plugin be deactivated.

If you're interested in automatic plugin and theme updates with visual
regression testing, consider the Kinsta Automatic Updates
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuowMewsD0yG1GbJf9SzgPBq992qho52qQ0fhXJGSTe-2FrdiVke-2B-2B9y36CrlFrkVTTBzJSYBaU2zMagshlsO2heoKpM28H6xMPPfA0lQqwWU-2FmEGA4-2FuZO-2Bo0B1-2BDBn9-2FtSmeOGRcfSZgLRtwhNr9vGOc-3DP21J_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKBk5ZgiEfJ9H-2Fn3CED0ZxGZk0-2BcaS2pzycoUxuHvFIsHciZEb5tGdHcXBE3zFQJdTDi8UTvsqbgUGFmIufR75eOIAoxkrVVfC6wcswezU-2B83XYOSaqU4ihrp2g6O-2BlxiYMLNRxoPE16SOOsITA8FziMv228ah9jBIzL5k-2BM2pYNNago-2B0hTcY49NzPNXWKIzxPDqpq4AfhbD5We6OIuu2qW>
add-on. To activate Kinsta Automatic Updates, go to MyKinsta > WordPress
sites > *site name* > Plugins and themes and click the "Auto-update
settings" button. Then select "Kinsta Automatic Updates."

We detected this vulnerability on June 20th, 2025, at 3:08 PM UTC, but due
to the time difference between scanning for vulnerabilities and sending
notifications, you may have already removed the plugin.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for being a Kinsta client!


ID: widget-logic
